title: Bodyguards for Azerbaijani president, in town for Trump’s Board of Peace, attack protesters in DC
summary_full: Demonstrators were outside hotel in Washington demanding the release of political prisoners in AzerbaijanBodyguards traveling with the Azerbaijani president, who was visiting Washington for the inaugural meeting of Donald Trump’s Board of Peace, punched, kicked and chased protesters outside a Washington hotel on Thursday, video footage shows.Demonstrators calling for the release of political prisoners were driven from the street near the motorcade of Ilham Aliyev, the Azerbaijani leader. Continue reading...
